description.english: Reach the Foundation Establishment cultivation level.
Equip only Superior-tier (or higher) quality equipment.
description.schinese: 穿戴的装备品质全部为上品及以上。
description.tchinese: 穿戴的裝備品質全部為上品及以上。

description.english: Equip only Elite-tier (or higher) quality equipment.
description.schinese: 穿戴的装备品质全部为极品及以上。
description.tchinese: 穿戴的裝備品質全部為極品及以上。

description.english: Equip only Immortal-tier quality equipment.
description.schinese: 穿戴的装备品质全部为仙品。
description.tchinese: 穿戴的裝備品質全部為仙品。

description.english: Obtain 1,000,000 Ling Stones.
Obtain 10,000,000 Ling Stones.
Obtain 100,000,000 Ling Stones.
Defeat 10,000 common monsters.
Defeat 100,000 common monsters.
Defeat 1,000,000 common monsters.
Defeat 100 elite monsters.
Defeat 1,000 elite monsters.
Defeat 10,000 elite monsters.
Defeat 1 boss monster.
Defeat 10 boss monsters.
Defeat 100 boss monsters.
Clear the Underground Palace once.
Clear the Underground Palace 10 times.
Clear the Underground Palace 100 times.
Reach the 100th floor of the Underground Palace.
Activate the Swiftwind Spring 10 times.
Activate the Eruption Spring 10 times.
Activate the Amplification Spring 10 times.
Activate the Dash Spring 10 times.
Activate the Spirit Crystal Spring 10 times.
Activate the Annihilation Spring 10 times.
Activate the Sanctuary Spring 10 times.
Collect 1,000 herbs.
Collect 10,000 herbs.
Collect 100,000 herbs.
Collect 1,000 ores.
Collect 10,000 ores.
Collect 100,000 ores.
Craft a pill recipe using fragments.
Successfully refine 100 pills at the Alchemist.
description.schinese: 在炼丹师处成功炼制100枚丹药。
description.tchinese: 在煉丹師處成功煉製100枚丹藥。

description.english: Repair equipment 100 times at the Blacksmith.
description.schinese: 在铁匠处进行100次装备修复。
description.tchinese: 在鐵匠處進行100次裝備修復。

description.english: Dismantle equipment 100 times at the Blacksmith.
description.schinese: 在铁匠处进行100次装备分解。
description.tchinese: 在鐵匠處進行100次裝備分解。

description.english: Upgrade equipment 100 times at the Blacksmith.
description.schinese: 在铁匠处进行100次装备升级。
description.tchinese: 在鐵匠處進行100次裝備升級。

description.english: Upgrade any equipment to Level 5 at the Blacksmith.
description.schinese: 在铁匠处将任意装备升至5级。
description.tchinese: 在鐵匠處將任意裝備升至5級。

description.english: Forge 100 Underground Palace Keys at the Blacksmith.
description.schinese: 在铁匠处制作100把地宫钥匙。
description.tchinese: 在鐵匠處製作100把地宮鑰匙。

description.english: Dismantle jade 100 times at the Jeweler.
description.schinese: 在首饰匠处分解100次玉石。
description.tchinese: 在首飾匠處分解100次玉石。

description.english: Craft jade 100 times at the Jeweler.
description.schinese: 在首饰匠处制作100次玉石。
description.tchinese: 在首飾匠處製作100次玉石。

description.english: Craft a Celestial-grade jade at the Jeweler.
description.schinese: 在首饰匠处制作仙品玉石。
description.tchinese: 在首飾匠處製作仙品玉石。

description.english: Add sockets to jade 100 times at the Jeweler.
description.schinese: 在首饰匠处添加镶孔100次。
description.tchinese: 在首飾匠處添加鑲孔100次。

description.english: Perform 100 Power Engravings at the Enchanter.
description.schinese: 在符咒师处进行100次威能刻印。
description.tchinese: 在符咒師處進行100次威能刻印。

description.english: Refine equipment 100 times at the Enchanter.
description.schinese: 在符咒师处进行100次装备精炼。
description.tchinese: 在符咒師處進行100次裝備精煉。

description.english: Fuse equipment 100 times at the Enchanter.
description.schinese: 在符咒师处进行100次装备融合。
description.tchinese: 在符咒師處進行100次裝備融合。

description.english: Enchant equipment 100 times at the Enchanter.
description.schinese: 在符咒师处进行100次装备附魔。
description.tchinese: 在符咒師處進行100次裝備附魔。

description.english: Perform 100 Celestial-grade reforges at the Enchanter.
description.schinese: 在符咒师处进行100次仙品熔铸。
description.tchinese: 在符咒師處進行100次仙品熔鑄。

description.english: Sell items 100 times to any Merchant.
description.schinese: 在任意商人处售卖100次物品。
description.tchinese: 在任意商人處售賣100次物品。

description.english: Buy back an item once from any Merchant.
description.schinese: 在任意商人处回购一次物品。
description.tchinese: 在任意商人處回購一次物品。

description.english: Purchase an additional storage page for your Storage Chest.
description.schinese: 在储物箱中购买额外的储物页。
description.tchinese: 在儲物箱中購買額外的儲物頁。

description.english: Expand your backpack capacity once.
Unlock any Domain.
Equip any Divine Monument.
Learn 10 different skills from the Seven Mansions Star Ring.
description.schinese: 学习七宿星环上面10个不同的技能。
description.tchinese: 學習七宿星環上面10個不同的技能。

description.english: Maximize the level of a Nine Dragons Seal.
description.schinese: 将一枚九龙盘符篆升至满级。
description.tchinese: 將一枚九龍盤符篆升至滿級。

description.english: Socket any Nine Dragons Seal.
description.schinese: 镶嵌任意一枚九龙盘符篆。
description.tchinese: 鑲嵌任意一枚九龍盤符篆。

description.english: Activate any Artifact Control effect.
Reach the highest level in Axe Control Art.
Reach the highest level in Spear Control Art.
Reach the highest level in Sword Control Art.
Reach the highest level in Staff Control Art.
Enlighten any cultivation method 10 times.
Complete 100 Demonic Gluttonous Altars (Slaughter Mode).
Complete 100 Survivor Gluttonous Altars.
Complete 100 Domination Array Gluttonous Altars.
description.schinese: 完成100次占上法阵饕餮祭坛。
description.tchinese: 完成100次占上法陣饕餮祭壇。

description.english: Complete 100 Guardian Gluttonous Altars (Defense Mode).
Clear 10 floors in any Gluttonous Altar mode.
description.schinese: 完成任意模式的饕餮祭坛的10层挑战。
description.tchinese: 完成任意模式的饕餮祭壇的10層挑戰。

description.english: Travel a total distance of 10,000 meters.
Reach the Golden Core stage of cultivation.
Reach the Nascent Soul stage of cultivation.
Reach the Spirit Transformation stage of cultivation.
Reach the Void Refining stage of cultivation.
Reach the Unity stage of cultivation.
Reach the Great Ascension stage of cultivation.
Survive the Heavenly Tribulation and reach the Transcendence stage.
Attain the Celestial stage of enlightenment.
Trigger the Blood Moon event 10 times.
Complete 10 Cursed Dragon Spring events.
Complete 10 Demonic Ascension Ritual events.
Assist other cultivators 10 times in joint cultivation.
Complete 10 Blood Altar Sacrifice events.
Craft a 10th-grade Revitalization Pill.
Craft a 9th-grade Breakthrough Pill.
Craft a Celestial-grade Marrow Tempering Pill.
Craft a Celestial-grade Spiritual Energy Pill.
Unlock all Powers in the Power Tome.
description.schinese: 威能簿中解锁全部威能。
description.tchinese: 威能簿中解鎖全部威能。

description.english: Learn any key passive skill from the Seven Mansions Star Ring.
description.schinese: 学习七宿星环上面任意一个关键被动技能。
description.tchinese: 學習七宿星環上面任意一個關鍵被動技能。

description.english: Ignite 100 nodes on the Nine Dragons Seal.
Attach an additional Nine Dragons Seal.
Activate all Teleportation Arrays in the world.
Complete all side quests.
